changelog.zh:
- 新增：数据库添加 fallback_logo_url 字段，导入/刷新时预先查询备用台标
- 优化：台标加载性能，M3U 台标失败时立即显示备用台标
- 修复：刷新播放列表后收藏夹丢失的问题
- 修复：多屏选择页面频道列表为空的问题
- 优化：使用节流 setState 避免大量台标失败时消息队列爆炸
changelog.en:
- Added: fallback_logo_url field in database, pre-query backup logos on import/refresh
- Improved: Logo loading performance, show backup logo immediately when M3U logo fails
- Fixed: Favorites lost after refreshing playlist
- Fixed: Empty channel list in multi-screen selector
- Improved: Use throttled setState to avoid message queue overflow when many logos fail
